subject: Re: [junit] Re: junit.textui.TestRunner
msgSnippet: Because JUnit is under IBM public license (http://oss.software.ibm.com/developerworks/opensource/license10.html), I think that there are some issues in using
messageBody:
Because JUnit is under IBM public license
(http://oss.software.ibm.com/developerworks/opensource/license10.html),
I think that there are some issues in using their source code (since the
test runners are not in the published API).

However, with the help of TestListener and TestResult, which are both
published, you can create your own test runner without bothering the
source code.

Shane

--
Disclaimer: I join all the news groups out of my own interest. All opinions expressed here are my own and not necessarily those of my employer.
